implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Orchestrates the periodic extraction cycle, invoking data fetch, hashing, ingestion, and error handling every 1 minute as required.
implementation.name: run_extraction_cycle
implementation.pseudo_code:
Initialize repository, hashing, and ingestion services
WHILE True:
    TRY:
        Log start of extraction cycle
        Fetch meter data from EKM API
        Log fetched meter data
        Hash meter data using SHA-256 and private key
        Log successful hashing
        Ingest hashed data to cloud
        Log successful ingestion
    EXCEPT Exception:
        Log error during extraction cycle
    Sleep for configured interval (1 minute)

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Implements the extraction of meter data from EKM Omnimeter Pulse v.4 using EKM API Push 3, fulfilling the periodic data extraction requirement.
implementation.name: fetch_meter_data
implementation.pseudo_code:
Build API URL for meter
Set authorization header
TRY:
    Send GET request to EKM API
    Raise error if response is not successful
    Parse JSON response
    Extract required meter fields
    Return MeterData object
EXCEPT Exception:
    Raise RuntimeError for failed fetch

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Hashes the extracted meter data using SHA-256 and signs it with a cryptographic private key, fulfilling the secure hashing requirement.
implementation.name: hash_meter_data
implementation.pseudo_code:
Serialize meter data to JSON string
Hash data using SHA-256
Sign hash with private key (PKCS1v15, SHA-256)
Return hex-encoded signature

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles ingestion of hashed meter data into the target cloud system, fulfilling the cloud ingestion requirement.
implementation.name: ingest
implementation.pseudo_code:
TRY:
    Send POST request to cloud ingest URL with hashed data
    Raise error if response is not successful
    Return response JSON
EXCEPT Exception:
    Raise RuntimeError for failed ingestion

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Provides robust error handling and logging throughout the extraction cycle, ensuring continuous operation and traceability.
implementation.name: setup_logger

Create logger with specified name
Set log level to INFO
Attach stream handler to stdout
Format log messages with timestamp and level
Return logger instance
